A few days passed after Inori was approved to\nprovide regional contribution to Kannagi.%K%P
In order to report on my progress, I was meeting\nwith Inori in the living room.%K%P
'Thank you for waiting. I'm here to report to\nyou about the state of progress regarding your\nregional contribution.'%K%P
'Perfect timing. I wanted to discuss something\nwith you too.'%K%P
Seems Inori was doing what she could without\nwaiting for me.%K%P
'Then I'll go first. Regarding the regional\ncontribution, I went ahead and notified the\npeople of the shopping street about it.'%K%P
'So if something happens, I'm sure they'll go\nstraight to you for help.'%K%P
'I'm impressed. You spread the word in such a\nshort time.'%K%P
She seemed so impressed, I felt a little\nembarrassed.%K%P
I wonder how Inori would react if I poked fun at\nher now.%K%P
'Must be my usual natural virtues. These results\nwere expected.'%K%P
'You're the best, Sho!'%K%P
I said it as a joke, but Inori's admiring eyes\nmade me even more embarrassed.%K%P
This wasn't something that I was used to.%K%P
'Ahem... Th-That said, you can anticipate the\ntownspeople coming for your help in the near\nfuture.'%K%P
'Thank you so much for all your help!'%K%P
'No thanks necessary.'%K%P
'You've been nice to me ever since we met. You\nwere always there even when Akane and I troubled\nyou so many times.'%K%P
'Whenever I made mistakes, you helped me right\naway. Just like how you did now.'%K%P
'How should I repay you for everything...?'%K%P
'I only acted with my own will.'%K%P
If it was something I didn't want to do, I\nwouldn't do it so readily.%K%P
I really wanted to help Inori out because her\nfeelings towards the town were genuine.%K%P
As I spent more time with Inori, my desire to\nhelp her out got even stronger.%K%P
'Hey Inori, If you do feel indebted, let's work\ntogether to settle everyone's worries.'%K%P
'Yes, please. We'll work together to settle the\npeople's-- Huh?'%K%P
'W-With you?'%K%P
'Of course. That was the plan in the first\nplace. Is there an issue?'%K%P
'Not at all... But you're taking on Akane's\nrehabilitation as well.'%K%P
'If you started helping me, you won't have any\ntime for yourself...'%K%P
Heh, she was worried over nothing.%K%P
'I'll manage my time somehow. But like I said\nbefore, I'm helping because I want to help you.'%K%P
'Hmmm...'%K%P
'Anyway, what did you want to discuss with me?'%K%P
I purposely ignored her stare and urged to\nchange the subject.%K%P
'Oh, yes. I actually brought in an inquiry.'%K%P
'Really? I'm impressed that you got one already.\nOkay, tell me about it.'%K%P
'Well, it's this.'%K%P
The flyer included a photo of a calico cat with\nthe headline, 'Searching for Cat.'%K%P
'So...it's a cat search?'%K%P
If that was on the flyer, then that's it.%K%P
'This person's dear cat went missing a little\nwhile ago.'%K%P
'I could tell from this flyer that the owner\ncares a lot for this cat, so I'd like to find it\nas soon as possible.'%K%P
Yup, just as Inori said, the flyer depicted\nurgency.%K%P
It was obvious that this cat was very precious\nto its owner.%K%P
'Let's get this cat back to its owner!'%K%P
'Yes! We must find the cat so the owner can find\npeace of mind.'%K%P
'All the more reason for me to help you. The\nmore people the better when you're searching for\na cat.'%K%P
'You're coming with me?'%K%P
'Do you not want me to?'%K%P
'Not at all! It's rather...'%K%P
'Rather?'%K%P
Inori paused in the middle of her thought.%K%P
'N-Never mind... In any case, you're going to\nhelp me find this cat!'%K%P
'Of course. Let's do so together.'%K%P
If she was about to tell me that she welcomed my\ncompany, it would've made me happy.%K%P
'I appreciate your help.'%K%P
And that's how Inori and I started to offer\nregional contribution.%K%P
We searched in areas where cats gathered and\nasked around the shopping street, but noody had\nseen the cat.%K%P
After we left the shopping street, I noticed\nthat Inori was looking tired.%K%P
'Hey, why don't we take a break?'%K%P
Since we'd been searching for hours, I'd figured\nit was about time for one.%K%P
We'd be more efficient if we took a break\nanyway.%K%P
'Sure, let's take a short break.'%K%P
'It's decided. So why don't we go to the park\nand-- Inori?'%K%P
I found it strange that she didn't respond, so I\nfollowed her gaze and saw a olive brown calico\ncat right in front of us.%K%P
'That cat...'%K%P
'I found it!'%K%P
'Hey, wait!'%K%P
'Inori!'%K%P
I ran after Inori who started to chase after the\ncat that was running away.%K%P
'*Huff, huff* W-Wait!'%K%P
Unfortunately, she was way too slow!%K%P
I'm sure she ran as fast as she could, but I\neasily passed her just by jogging.%K%P
'S-Stop...p-please stop!'%K%P
Inori desperately chased after the kitten, but\nthere was no way she could catch up.%K%P
Perhaps due to Inori's low stamina, we weren't\nable to get any closer to the kitten.%K%P
'Inori, I'll run ahead and catch up with the\nkitten... Whoa!'%K%P
When I caught up and tried to catch it, the\nkitten made an impressive jump and flew over to\nthe other side of the wall.%K%P
'What to do...'%K%P
I scratched my head in front of the wall.%K%P
There was a small hole in the wall,  but it\ndidn't look like I could fit through.%K%P
But by the time we went around the wall, we'd\nlose sight of the cat.%K%P
'Haa! *Gasp, pant* Sh-Sho... While you go\naround, I'll pass through here to chase it.'%K%P
'Will you be okay...?'%K%P
'Y-Yes. D-Don't worry. I'm going for it.'%K%P
'What!'%K%P
I froze when I watched Inori crouch down to pass\nthrough the opening.%K%P
'U-Um, Inori? Y-Your underwear...'%K%P
Her butt stuck out as she leaned in which lifted\nup her clothes and made her underwear completely\nvisible.%K%P
'Oh? Did it get turned up? I'll pass right\nthrough so please don't mind me.'%K%P
She wasn't concerned about her underwear being\nexposed at all.%K%P
'Ah, my chest is caught and it's making it hard\nfor me to move forward.'%K%P
As Inori moved, her protruded butt swayed left\nand right.%K%P
Because we ran, her underwear, damp from sweat\nclung tightly on her skin, emphasizing her\nwomanly figure even more.%K%P
I knew I had to go and chase the kitten, but I\ncouldn't take my eyes off this sight.%K%P
'Uh, uh, almost there...'%K%P
'Wait!'%K%P
As she pushed and squeezed through the opening,\nher underwear slid off a bit to reveal quite the\nsight.%K%P
I couldn't concentrate on anything else.%K%P
As she swayed, her underwear slipped down along\nwith it.%K%P
'Ah, my chest... But it's just-- Uhmm...'%K%P
She made a bunch of sensual sounds.%K%P
I'm sure she wasn't doing it intentionally, but\nsince it looked like she was seducing me, I\ncouldn't stop thinking about touching her.%K%P
'There, ah, it's hard to go forward...'%K%P
'*Gulp*'%K%P
The proper thing to do would be to call and help\nher out, but I was a dude, after all.%K%P
If a cute girl's underwear was in plain sight\nlike this, of course I'd get excited and want to\nkeep watching.%K%P
'Ah, just, a little more... Hmm.'%K%P
'Whoa!'%K%P
As she continued to push through, her underwear\nwas about to completely slide off.%K%P
If that were to happen, the situation would get\nworse with practically everything exposed, so I\ntried to call out to her, but...%K%P
'Yes! I got out!'%K%P
While I was busy debating with myself, she made\nit through the opening.%K%P
I heard Inori's excited voice from the other\nside of the opening.%K%P
'All right, I'm going to keep chasing the cat.'%K%P
'I should too...'%K%P
After I taking a breath, I dashed off to get my\nmind out of the gutter.%K%P
I took a long detour, then Inori messaged me\nthat she found the kitten.%K%P
I rushed to the park hoping we wouldn't lose\nsight again and found Inori nervously climbing\nup a tree.%K%P
'Ah! Inori! Watch out!'%K%P
'I-I'm all right! I'm almost there.'%K%P
When I dashed under the tree, Inori had already\nclimbed all the way up to the branch where the\nkitten sat.%K%P
The kitten looked so petrified that it didn't\nmake a sound.%K%P
'It's all right. It's okay.'%K%P
Inori gently smiled at the kitten and made it\napparent that she had no animosity.%K%P
'There, there.'%K%P
Inori approached the kitten, trying not to scare\nit away.%K%P
The kitten sensed that it was safe. Its body\ncontinued to tremble, but it didn't try to\nescape.%K%P
'I caught it.'%K%P
Inori reached over and clutched the cat to her\nchest.%K%P
But, that was a mistake.%K%P
'Ah!'%K%P
Then suddenly Inori started to lose her balance\non the branch.%K%P
'Inori!'%K%P
'Ahhh!'%K%P
Inori held the kitten in her arms to protect it.%K%P
'I'm gonna make it!'%K%P
I kicked the ground, reached out with my hand\nand jumped forward.%K%P
'Huh? Nothing hurts...'%K%P
'Ouch...'%K%P
I was able to catch Inori from what would have\nbeen a painful fall.%K%P
'Are you okay?'%K%P
Inori didn't respond, her face was bright red\nand her eyes were glistening.%K%P
'Oh no, did you get hurt?'%K%P
I panicked and checked all over her body.\nThankfully, she hadn't been injured.%K%P
'Th-Thank you very much for saving me.'%K%P
'But, um... It's embarrassing when you hold and\nstare at me like that.'%K%P
'Oh, ahh, sorry. I didn't mean to.'%K%P
I got startled when I saw Inori blushing in my\narms.%K%P
When I came to my senses, Inori's body felt soft\nand extremely delicate, as if she could break if\nI hugged her tightly.%K%P
Her rough breathing, flushed cheeks, and\nperfectly shaped lips captured my attention.%K%P
'Inori...'%K%P
My heart beat so fast. It was like I was under a\nspell, I couldn't take my eyes off of her.%K%P
My face naturally got closer to her lips...%K%P
'Um, Sho?'%K%P
'What? Oh... E-Excuse me. I-I'll put you down.'%K%P
When I realized what I was about to do, I tried\nto let Inori out of my arms.%K%P
But she tightly gripped my shirt and looked at\nme with lonesome eyes.%K%P
'Um, if you don't mind...can we stay like this\nfor a little bit longer?'%K%P
I swallowed my breath at the sight of her\nglistening eyes.%K%P
I always thought she was just so beautiful.%K%P
And after spending a whole day and seeing the\ndifferent sides of her, she looked even more\nbeautiful.%K%P
I couldn't look straight into her eyes.%K%P
'W-With that, we fulfilled a request!'%K%P
'Y-Yup. Case closed, for now.'%K%P
We were still blushing as we laughed together.%K%P
When we returned the cat to our client, they\nbowed and thanked us many times.%K%P
We successfully fulfilled our first request. It\nmade me feel good inside to help.%K%P
